google_translated: Those who committed the mistakes are trying to blame their mind

en_text: It's impossible to fix the mistake. Man can't return to the past.
jp_text: 過ちを正すことはできない
google_translated: I can not correct the mistake

en_text: ...to dilute the memories\nthat can't be denied.
jp_text: 偽っても隠せない思いを酒で薄め 喉に流し込む
google_translated: Pour a thin sake with a sake with a fake

en_text: Frank Marlon the gunsmith\ndoes nothing but drink.
jp_text: 銃職人 フランク･マーロンは ただ酒を飲む
google_translated: Merchoon Frank Marlon is just drinking alcohol

en_text: And he questions\nthe drained glass, "Am I wrong?"
jp_text: そして 空になったグラスに問いかける
google_translated: And ask a glass that became empty
